content: if you love a good scrap-buster pattern and you aren t afraid to weave in some ends then the polka dottie blanket is the perfect project for you this circle granny square blanket is made from individual squares that are joined together as you crochet using a join as you go method this means that you don t have to sew your squares together instead you can watch your blanket grow as you crochet finish this blanket off with a cute pom-pom border to add some playfulness this blanket is a true labour of love so i hope you have it for years to come >the free pattern for the custom sized blanket can be found ** here 1 ** > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout crochet skill level advanced beginner / intermediate crochet stitches chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet crochet terminology us terms language english video tutorials yes the pdf includes video tutorials for the granny square join as you go method and the border photo tutorials yes the free pattern and pdf include step-by-step pictures and a photo tutorial for each stitch and technique sizes the pdf includes instructions and yardage for 9 sizes - baby 40 x 40 lapghan 43 x 52 custom 43 x 58 small throw 52 x 64 large throw 61 x 76 twin 64 x 85 full sized 76 x 85 queen 82 x 91 king 94 x 91 customizable yes instructions are included to customize the size of your blanket yarn medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design > other details * 4 5mm crochet hooks needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * the printable pdf is a total of 18 pages * step-by-step pictures and video tutorials included * colour chart/instructions * pattern has been tech edited * the blanket pictured is a custom sized throw that measures 43 wide x 58 long 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-a-circle-granny-square-blanket
